item.title: Radiator
item.description: In the musical Hamilton, they sing about “being in the room where it happened”. As Engineering Manager, I’ve now finally found myself in “the room” where a lot of talk happens. Decisions get made, strategies are strategised and plans are hatched…

item.title: Transition
item.description: Life is all about change. I had never thought I would be a software engineer in earnest…
